name: Cube Crafting
description: Adds recipes for more item crafting using the Horadric cube.
author: CelticHound

config.name: Remove items from sockets
config.description: Recipes to remove items from sockets (item + Thawing potion) (2 new recipes). May require the ExpandedCube mod to handle big items with lots of runes.

config.name: Convert to normal item
config.description: Recipes to convert Magic/Rare/Set/Unique items to Normal items, or Low Quality -> Normal -> Superior (item + Antidote potion + Stamina Potion) (8 new recipes).

config.name: Reroll charms
config.description: Recipes to take two magic charms of the same size and return one new charm (3 new recipes).

config.name: Reroll rings/amulets/jewels
config.description: Recipes: 2 rings -> amulet, 2 amulets -> ring, 2 magic jewels -> rare jewel, 2 rare jewels -> magic jewel (6 new recipes).

config.name: Toggle sockets in items
config.description: Toggle sockets in normal and superior items - rerolls the item - item + Stamina Potion (16 new recipes).

config.name: Add sockets to Rare/Set/Unique items
config.description: Recipes to add sockets to Rare/Set/Unique items - item + Antidote Potion + Portal Scroll (3 new recipes).

config.name: Upgrade Rare/Set/Unique - Basic->Exceptional->Elite
config.description: Upgrade Rare/Set/Unique items to Exceptional or Elite - item + Antidote Potion + Identify Scroll (12 new recipes).

config.name: Reroll item
config.description: Reroll an item - item + Stamina Potion + Identify Scroll (5 new recipe).

config.name: Fix unique items for crafting
config.description: Allow unique items to drop more than once per game and lower some item levels.
